discourse_list.title: My SAI is diluted to $1 from $22.. can I revert it back?

content.content: [New to Crypto space here] I had 135 SAI in my metamask which was earlier around $2k+, now after few months I just opened my account and saw SAI value is now became $135. Wtf!  Screenshot from 2021-11-05 20-14-111122×276 11.2 KB  I checked whats going on and saw news about "Shutdown ". I wasn’t aware of this news before as I was just regular crypto investor… I don’t follow this news.  Screenshot from 2021-11-05 20-16-06726×608 18.2 KB  Is there any way to get my profit ($2k+) back?  What I should do?
Seems fine on uniswap. Metamask is probably just displaying the price incorrectly:
